remarks: Property of being a homomorphism of groups.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isghm.w $e |- X = ( Base ` S ) $.
isghm.x $e |- Y = ( Base ` T ) $.
isghm.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
isghm.b $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
isghm $p |- ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. Grp /\ T e. Grp ) /\ ( F : X --> Y /\ A. u e. X A. v e. X ( F ` ( u .+ v ) ) = ( ( F ` u ) .+^ ( F ` v ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ u v $.
$d .+^ u v $.
$d F u v $.
$d S u v $.
$d T u v $.
$d X u v $.
$d Y u v $.
